name: X-Ray Game Data File
summary: A CFORM file is a game data file used by various video games developed with the GSC Game World X-Ray Engine and the fan-made, open-source OpenXRay game engine. It stores map and level information in a proprietary format that a game references to load related data. Users should not attempt to open CFORM files; instead, developers using a game SDK , such as S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Clear Sky SDK or Call of Pripyat SDK, generate CFORM files to store map and level data that users can play in the appropriate game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
